titles.title: Expressing support for the goals of Sports Eye Safety Month by promoting the importance of playing sports with the proper protective eyewear.
Expressing support for the goals of Sports Eye Safety Month by promoting the importance of playing sports with the proper protective eyewear.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the goals and ideals of Sports Eye Safety Month and encourages all Americans, especially youth, to play sports with protective eyewear.
